flavorText: "If you hire a sell-sword, you'd better watch your back. Hire me, and I'll watch it for you."

name: Kazandu Blademaster
originalText:
First strike, vigilance
Whenever Kazandu Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Kazandu Blademaster.

rulings.text: This ability triggers on this creature entering the battlefield, so it will enter the battlefield with its unmodified power and toughness, and then receive a +1/+1 counter a short time later. It does not enter the battlefield with the +1/+1 counter already on it.

text:
